original_text:
What will you do on the day of punishment,
    in the ruin that will come from afar?
To whom will you flee for help,
    and where will you leave your wealth?
korean_text: 벌하시는 날과 멀리서 오는 환난 때에 너희가 어떻게 하려느냐 누구에게로 도망하여 도움을 구하겠으며 너희의 영화를 어느 곳에 두려느냐

sentences.original_text: What will you do on the day of punishment
sentences.korean_translation: 너희가 벌 받는 날에 무엇을 하겠느냐

sentences.original_text: in the ruin that will come from afar
sentences.korean_translation: 먼 곳에서 올 그 황폐함 속에서

sentences.original_text: To whom will you flee for help
where will you leave your wealth
